scene_description_enriched: Four figures, all appearing to be male, stand together against a gold leaf background. The figures are dressed in medieval attire. The leftmost figure wears a long blue robe. Next to him, a figure in a pink tunic and blue robe. The third figure from the left wears a blue robe over a red garment, with decorative white trim. The rightmost figure is clad in a green tunic and red hose. The figures' poses suggest conversation or contemplation, with hands gesturing or held close to the body. The scene is set on a dark, textured ground.
scene_interpretation: This scene likely depicts a group of disciples or apostles, possibly engaged in discussion or receiving instruction. The gold background is characteristic of devotional manuscripts, signifying a sacred or heavenly context.
